amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds from being obligated or expended at properties owned by the President or that bear his name, with a waiver made available if the President reimburses the Department of the Treasury for the amount associated with the expense.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 44 printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 to prohibit the use of funds from being obligated or expended at properties owned by the President or that bear his name, with a waiver made available if the President reimburses the Department of the Treasury for the amount associated with the expense.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lieu, Ted amendment (A028) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 205, 1 Present (Roll no. 457).

action.text: Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Lieu, Ted.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
